FuncDef: The display cpos-trunk command displays the configurations of a CPOS-Trunk interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a CPOS-Trunk interface.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 127.

Examples: Operate status: up     Number Of Up Port In Trunk: 2
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After configuring a CPOS-Trunk interface on a device, run the display cpos-trunk command to check whether the configurations of the CPOS-Trunk interface are correct.
Prerequisites
The CPOS-Trunk interface has been configured.
